title: Ticket #6281: Starter should set a new attribute rather than JobStartDate
description:
Currently (8.7.1 and earlier) the Starter sets JobStartDate to the time that it called create_process to begin the job's executable. This is a bug, since JobStartDate is defined to be the start time of the first execution of the job, and is set correctly by the Schedd. This bug has been partially fixed by #6280, but that only solved the problem for the Schedd and the job queue. The Startd currently sees the wrong value for JobStartDate.

We should define a new attribute for the Starter to set, so that policy expressions in the Startd can use that instead of JobStartDate. Perhaps ExecutionStartTime ?
